instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
hello,

so first the macbook didnt have backlight, i have replaced the fuse and LCD connector because they were corroded, now the screen works perfectly,

but the problem is that the keyboard and touchpad are not working only the power button is working i can turn the macbook on and off,

i dont see any other corrosions on the board.
its an macbook pro 15'' early 2013

can anyone help please?

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: it does work with external keyboard and mouse via USB

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
Check R5701/2/4.
Be sure U5701 is correctly powered up.
Post BUTTON_DISABLE signal level.

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
R5702 - (pin1   0V )  (pin2    0v)

R5701 (pin1   2.76V) (pin2   2.76V)

BUTTON_DISABLE  0V

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
"Be sure U5701 is correctly powered up."
???

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: how can i check it?? i have checked all the solder joints and it looks all good no corrosion

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
Do you get VDD at U5701?

Inspect U2700 area too.
Bluetooth works?

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
wifi bluetooth and all usb ports are working
i get 3.03V VDD at U5701 i have measured it on C5701 and C5706..shouldnt this be 3.3V?
  and everything around U2700 looks perfect no sign of damage..

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: Change U5701 then...

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
i have replaced R5704 and now i do have 3.3V VDD on  C5701 and C5706..
the keyboard backlight is working now but the keyboard itself and trackpad dont.
do i still need to replace U5701 if i have 3.3V?

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: Yes, try another U5701, from donor board.

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: I will need to order it because i dont have it, ill post when i got it. Thanks

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: Buy scrap board, do not use new one.

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
yes i have ordered an donor board.

can SMC lid cause this problem aswell? because when i measure J5050 pin 6 SMC_LID_R i get only 1.52V

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: SMC_LID MUST stay at 3.3V and BUTTON_DISABLE at 0V.

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
when i measure at  R5050 i get 3.3V  SMC_LID and  SMC_LID_R also 3.3V
but at J5050 i get 1.52V is it normal? or is this caused by U5701?

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
Not normal, unless R5050 is bad; incorrect value, too high.
Solder correct resistor and check if SMC_LID works properly.

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: i have replaced the U5701 it worked for 1 minute and now its not working again, when the macbook is booting i can press the caps lock and the led goes on and off but once its booted the led stays on or off and TP and KB are not working

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: i have tried few more times and the KB and TP are working sometimes 1-2 mins then it stops

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message:
Be sure U5701 is correctly soldered; try another chip also.

Check U2700 area too.

threads.title: 820-3332 early 2013 no keyboard and trackpad only power button
threads.message: the problem is solved by replacing the  U5701, thanks!
